pages.text: $(l)Meaning:$() Cleansing and Protection $(br)$(l)Primary Aspect:$() $(9)Grace$()$(br)$(l)Obtaining:$() Produce smoky quartz in the $(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/imbuing_table)Imbuing Table$(), trade for it with a villager, or enhance it in the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/crystal_altar)Crystal Altar$()
